Job Descriptions 

Create and develop multimedia (audio/video) content for customer stories, internal company announcement videos, external promotional social videos, product marketing videos, and others.
•	Proposed Script, storyboard, budget, allocate resources, and deadlines arrangement.
•	Work independently, as well as part of a team, to establish video production as per requirement from management.
•	Collaborate closely with internal team for talent shooting 
•	Video Promotion shoots, editing, animating, select and reserve shoot locations
•	Develop production schedules and editing timeline
•	Technical support on animation, graphic and bumper to post in every social channel.
•	Control advertising in order to post monthly. 
•	Reserve and rent equipment as per assigned tasks.
•	Record and edit video and sound projects, including selecting program format for final output, capturing/importing media, organizing raw media, editing footage and sound files, creating and inserting static and motion graphics, titling, adding music/voice-over to support digital part to promote sale.
•	Manage video library.
•	Control shooting material and stock.
•	Supporting related department as per assigned from management.

Requirement

•	Bachelor degree in production shooting and video editing or related flied.
•	At least 3 years’ experience in real estate industry. 
•	Knowledge of TVC or video producing. 
•	Knowledge of technical lighting set up and lighting capacity.
•	Knowledge of sound and effect for Video and TVC.
•	Good communication to manage shooting team.
•	Well understanding of technical material for shooting equipment.

-Prepare employee work station.
